repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - LXDE
repository.description: The LXDE repository in the openSUSE Build Service, which provides you with the unsupported but latest version of the LX desktop environment and software.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - LibreOffice
repository.description: Provides you with the latest stable version of LibreOffice, the Office suite that openSUSE uses.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Mozilla
openSUSE BuildService - Mozilla
openSUSE BuildService - Mozilla
openSUSE BuildService - Mozilla
repository.summary: Most recent builds of Mozilla Software like Firefox
Nyeste pakker af Mozilla-software såsom Firefox
Nyeste pakker for Mozillaprogramvare som f.eks Firefox
repository.description: Containing the latest releases of all Mozilla software, such as the popular Thunderbird (mail client), Firefox and SeaMonkey (web browsers).
Indeholder de seneste udgivelser af al Mozilla-software, såsom de populære Thunderbird (e-mail-klient), Firefox og Seamonkey (webbrowsere).
Sisältää uusimmat Mozilla-ohjelmistoperheen julkaisut, kuten suositun Thunderbird-sähköpostiohjelman sekä Firefox- ja SeaMonkey-web-selaimet.
Inneholder de siste utgavene av all programvare fra Mozilla, slik som den populære Thunderbird (epostklient), Firefox og SeaMonkey (weblesere).

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Wine CVS Builds
openSUSE BuildService - Wine CVS-builds
openSUSE BuildService - Wine CVS Builds
openSUSE BuildService - Wine CVS-pakker
repository.description: Wine is an Open Source implementation of the Windows API, so it allows you to run some Windows applications in openSUSE. This repository provides the latest CVS (development) snapshot packages of Wine.

Wine er en open source implementation af Windows' API, så det tillader dig at køre visse Windows-programmer i openSUSE. Denne softwarekilde giver det seneste CVS (udvikling) øjebliksbillede-pakker af Wine.
Wine on avoimen lähdekoodin toteutus Windows API:sta. Joitakin Windows-sovelluksia voidaan suorittaa sen avulla openSUSEssa. Tämä asennuslähde tarjoaa viimeisimmät CVS (kehitys) -versiot Winestä.
Wine er en åpen kildekode-implementasjon av Windows APIet, som tillater kjøring av enkelte Windows-applikasjoner under openSUSE. Dette arkivet tilbyr de nyeste CVS-bildene (under utvikling) av Wine.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Games
openSUSE BuildService - spil
openSUSE BuildService - Pelit
openSUSE BuildService - Spill
repository.description: Contains several action games including Open Arena (shoot 'em up), Flight Gear (flight simulator) and Torcs (3D racing simulator).
Indeholder adskillige action-spil inkl. Open Arena (shoot 'em up), Flight Gear (flysimulator) og Torcs (3D racerspil).
Sisältää useita toimintapelejä, esimerkiksi Open Arena (ammuntapeli), Flight Gear (lentosimulaattori) ja Torcs (3D rata-ajo simulaattori).
Inneholder flere actionspill, herunder Open Arena (shoot 'em up), Flight Gear (flysimulator) og Torcs (3D racerspill).

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Drivers for webcams
openSUSE BuildService - drivere til webcams
openSUSE BuildService - Web-kamera-ajurit
openSUSE BuildService - Drivere for webkamera
repository.description: Contains recent drivers for hundreds of different webcams.
Indeholder nyere drivere for hundreder af forskellige webcams.
Sisältää tuoreet ajurit satoihin erilaisiin web-kameroihin.
Inneholder oppdaterte drivere for hundrevis av forskjellige webkamera.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Virtualization (VirtualBox)
openSUSE BuildService - virtualisering (VirtualBox)
openSUSE BuildService - Virtualisointi (VirtualBox)
openSUSE BuildService - Virtualisering (VirtualBox)
repository.description: Provides up-to-date builds of VirtualBox, a general-purpose open-source full virtualizer for x86 hardware.
Leverer ajourførte pakker af VirtualBox, en open source fuld virtualisering for x86-hardware til generelle formål.
Tarjoaa ajan tasalla olevat Virtualbox-paketit. Virtualbox on vapaan lähdekoodin yleiskäyttöinen täysvirtualisoija x86-laitteistolle.
Tilbyr oppdaterte pakker for VirtualBox, et generisk virtualiseringsverktøy for x86-maskinvare og basert på åpen kildekode.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - PHP
openSUSE BuildService - PHP
openSUSE BuildService - PHP
openSUSE BuildService - PHP
repository.description: Provides the latest packages and multiple-version builds of PHP software.
Leverer de seneste pakker og flereversions builds af PHP-software.
Tarjoaa PHP-ohjelmiston uusimmat paketit useina eri versioina.
Tilbyr de nyeste pakkene og flerversjonspakker for PHP-programvare.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Database
openSUSE BuildService - database
openSUSE BuildService - Tietokannat
openSUSE BuildService - Database
repository.description: Latest updates for database software including Firebird and MySQL.
Seneste opdateringer til database-software inkl. Firebird og MySQL.
Uusimmat tietokantaohjelmistot, mukaanlukien Firebird ja MySQL.
Nyeste oppdateringer for databaseprogramvare inkludert Firebird og MySQL.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - KDE:Extra
repository.description: Provides additional KDE software maintained by the openSUSE KDE community.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - GNOME:Apps
repository.description: Updates to the GNOME software that is shipped with the distribution (backports).
Opdateringer til det GNOME-software som leveres med distributionen (backports).
Päivittää GNOME-ohjelmistoja, jotka toimitettiin jakelun mukana (backports).
Oppdateringer til GNOME-programvaren som følger med distribusjonen (tilbakeporteringer).

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Mono:Community
openSUSE BuildService - Mono:Community
openSUSE BuildService - Mono:Community
openSUSE BuildService - Mono:Community
repository.description: Updates and Additions of applications written in Mono.
Opdateringer og yderligere programmer skrevet i Mono.
Mono-sovellusten päivityksiä ja lisäsovelluksia.
Oppdateringer og tillegg for programmer skrevet i Mono.

repository.description: Updates and Additions for Perl modules

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - devel:languages:python
repository.description: Updates and Additions for Python modules

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - filesystems
repository.description: Filesystem tools and FUSE-related packages.

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Education
repository.description: Contains several packages which might be interesting for educational use

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - Java:packages
repository.description: Provides uptodate Java packages (Factory backports)

repository.name: openSUSE BuildService - KDE:KDE3
repository.description: Provides old KDE for newer openSUSE
